general_advice.tempo: Control both lifting and lowering phases; avoid jerky movements
general_advice.range_of_motion: Use full range of motion unless limited by mobility or injury
general_advice.breathing: Exhale during exertion (the hard part), inhale during the return
general_advice.progression: Master proper form with lighter weights before adding load
general_advice.warmup: Perform warm-up sets before working sets on compound movements
general_advice.safety: Weight training has substantially lower injury rates than contact sports; proper form and periodization further reduce risk (Stone 1990, Zemper 1990)

exercises.name: Archer pull-up
exercises.description: One arm does most of the work while the other assists
instructions: Wide grip hang; pull toward one arm
Working arm bends fully, assisting arm stays straight
Lower with control, alternate sides
tips: Keep straight arm engaged, not passive

exercises.name: Barbell row
instructions: Hinge at hips, soft knees; grip just outside shoulders
Pull bar to lower chest
Lower to full arm extension
tips: Drive elbows past torso at top

exercises.name: Barbell shrug
instructions: Hold barbell at arm's length, overhand grip
Shrug shoulders toward ears, arms straight
Hold briefly at top, lower with control
tips: Lift straight up, don't roll shoulders

exercises.name: Cable close grip pulldown
exercises.description: Narrow grip pulldown for lower lat emphasis
instructions: Close-grip handle on high pulley; sit and grasp with palms facing
Pull to upper chest, squeezing shoulder blades
Return to full arm extension

exercises.name: Cable underhand pulldown
exercises.description: Underhand grip pulldown for biceps involvement
instructions: Underhand grip, shoulder-width; thighs secured
Pull bar to upper chest, squeezing back
Return to full extension
tips: Pull with back, not just arms

exercises.name: Chin-up
exercises.description: Underhand grip pull-up with biceps emphasis
instructions: Hang with palms facing you, shoulder-width
Pull up until chin clears bar
Lower to full extension

exercises.name: Deadlift
instructions: Bar over mid-foot; grip just outside knees
Back flat, chest up; drive through floor
Stand tall, hips and knees locked
Lower by hinging hips first, then knees
tips: Squeeze lats to keep bar against body
Push floor away rather than pulling bar

exercises.name: Dumbbell pullover
exercises.description: Stretching movement for lats and chest
instructions: Lie across bench, shoulders on pad, hips unsupported
Hold dumbbell overhead, slight elbow bend
Lower behind head until deep lat stretch
Pull back over chest
tips: Keep hips low for maximum stretch
avoid: Bending elbows more as weight lowers

exercises.name: Dumbbell row
instructions: Hand and knee on bench; dumbbell in opposite hand
Pull to hip
Lower to full extension
avoid: Rotating torso to heave the weight up
Cutting the rep short at the top

exercises.name: Inverted row
exercises.description: Bodyweight horizontal pull on low bar or rings
instructions: Bar at waist height; hang underneath, heels on ground
Pull chest to bar
Lower to full extension
tips: Body rigid from ankles to shoulders

exercises.name: Lat pulldown
instructions: Thighs secured; grip wider than shoulders
Pull bar to upper chest, slight lean-back
Return to full extension overhead
tips: Chest up to meet the bar

exercises.name: Pull-up
instructions: Hang with palms away, wider than shoulders
Pull up until chin clears bar
Lower to full extension
tips: Pull shoulder blades down and back first

exercises.name: Resistance band lat pulldown
instructions: Anchor overhead; kneel or stand gripping band
Pull to shoulder level, elbows to sides
Return overhead with control
tips: Lean back slightly for better angle

exercises.name: Resistance band row
instructions: Anchor at chest height; arms extended
Pull elbows back, hands to ribs
Return under tension

exercises.name: Seated cable row
instructions: Feet on platform, knees slightly bent; grip handle
Pull to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades
Return to arm extension with slight protraction

exercises.name: Barbell curl
instructions: Underhand grip, arms extended
Curl toward shoulders
Lower to full extension

exercises.name: Barbell preacher curl
exercises.description: Preacher bench curl for strict isolation
instructions: Armpits on pad top; arms extended
Curl toward shoulders
Lower to near-full extension
tips: Keep upper arms pressed into pad
Stop short of lockout for tension

exercises.name: Bodyweight biceps curl
exercises.description: Curl using bodyweight on low bar or rings
instructions: Bar at waist height; supinated grip, body angled
Curl up bending only at elbows
Lower to full extension
tips: Body rigid from head to heels

exercises.name: Cable biceps curl
instructions: Low pulley; face machine, grip bar
Curl toward shoulders
Lower maintaining tension
tips: Constant tension - no rest at bottom

exercises.name: Dumbbell biceps curl
instructions: Dumbbells at sides, palms forward
Curl toward shoulders
Lower to full extension
tips: Supinate as you curl for peak contraction

exercises.name: Dumbbell concentration curl
instructions: Sit with legs spread; elbow braced on inner thigh
Curl toward shoulder
Lower to full extension

exercises.name: Dumbbell hammer curl
instructions: Dumbbells at sides, palms facing each other
Curl toward shoulders, neutral grip
Lower with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell incline curl
exercises.description: Incline bench curl for increased stretch
instructions: Incline 45-60 degrees; arms hanging
Curl toward shoulders, upper arms stationary
Lower to full extension
tips: Arms hang straight for full stretch

exercises.name: Machine preacher curl
exercises.description: Machine preacher curl for guided isolation
instructions: Armpits on pad; grip handles
Curl toward shoulders
Lower to near-full extension

exercises.name: Resistance band biceps curl
instructions: Stand on band; palms up
Curl toward shoulders
Lower with control

exercises.name: Resistance band hammer curl
instructions: Stand on band; palms facing each other
Curl toward shoulders, neutral wrist
Lower with control

exercises.name: Barbell calf raise
exercises.description: Standing calf raise with barbell on back
instructions: Bar on upper back; heels hanging off platform
Rise onto toes as high as possible
Lower heels below platform for full stretch

exercises.name: Dumbbell calf raise
instructions: Heels hanging off platform; dumbbell in one hand
Rise onto toes as high as possible
Lower heels below platform

exercises.name: Dumbbell reverse calf raise
instructions: Heels on platform, toes hanging off
Raise toes as high as possible
Lower with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell seated calf raise
instructions: Sit with balls of feet on block; dumbbells on lower thighs
Push through toes to raise heels
Lower heels below platform

exercises.name: Resistance band calf raise
instructions: Stand on band, balls of feet
Rise onto toes against resistance
Lower with control
tips: Handles at shoulder height for tension

exercises.name: Seated calf raise machine
exercises.description: Machine seated calf raise for soleus
instructions: Balls of feet on platform, knees under pad
Release safety; lower heels
Raise heels as high as possible; lower for stretch

exercises.name: Seated resistance band calf raise
exercises.description: Seated band calf raise for soleus
instructions: Sit; band under balls of feet, hold ends
Push through toes to raise heels
Lower with control

exercises.name: Single-leg calf raise
instructions: One leg on step edge
Rise onto toes; lower heel below step
Complete all reps before switching

exercises.name: Standing calf raise
instructions: Heels hanging off step edge
Rise onto toes; squeeze at top
Lower heels below step for stretch

exercises.name: Standing calf raise machine
instructions: Shoulders under pads; balls of feet on platform
Rise onto toes as high as possible
Lower heels below platform for stretch
tips: Pause at top, full drop at bottom

exercises.name: Barbell bench press
instructions: Eyes under bar; grip wider than shoulders
Unrack; lower to mid-chest
Press until lockout

exercises.name: Barbell decline bench press
exercises.description: Decline press for lower chest emphasis
instructions: Decline bench, feet secured; grip wider than shoulders
Lower bar to lower chest
Press to full extension

exercises.name: Cable fly
instructions: Pulleys at shoulder height; step forward
Arms wide, slight elbow bend
Bring hands together; return wide

exercises.name: Chest dip
exercises.description: Parallel bar dip with forward lean for chest
instructions: Grip bars; lean forward ~30 degrees
Lower until chest stretch
Press back up
tips: Deep enough for stretch, not shoulder strain

exercises.name: Decline push-up
instructions: Feet on elevated surface; hands wider than shoulders
Lower chest toward floor
Press back up

exercises.name: Diamond push-up
exercises.description: Close-grip push-up for inner chest and triceps
instructions: Hands together in diamond shape under chest
Lower chest to hands
Press back up

exercises.name: Dumbbell bench press
exercises.description: Dumbbell press for balanced chest development
instructions: Dumbbells at chest level; feet flat
Press up until arms extend
Lower until upper arms parallel

exercises.name: Dumbbell fly
exercises.description: Chest isolation with stretch and contraction
instructions: Dumbbells above chest, palms facing
Lower wide with slight elbow bend until stretch
Squeeze chest to bring together

exercises.name: Dumbbell incline fly
exercises.description: Incline fly for upper chest isolation
instructions: Incline 30-45 degrees; dumbbells above chest
Lower wide with slight elbow bend until stretch
Squeeze chest to bring together

exercises.name: Incline barbell press
instructions: Bench 30-45 degrees; grip wider than shoulders
Lower to upper chest near clavicle
Press to lockout

exercises.name: Incline dumbbell press
exercises.description: Incline dumbbell press for upper chest
instructions: Bench 30-45 degrees; dumbbells at shoulder level
Press until arms extend
Lower to shoulder level

exercises.name: Machine chest press
exercises.description: Machine chest press with guided movement
instructions: Handles at chest level
Press forward until arms extend
Return to start

exercises.name: Push-up
instructions: Hands wider than shoulders
Lower chest to floor
Press back up
tips: Rigid plank from head to heels

exercises.name: Resistance band chest press
instructions: Band at chest height or around back
Press forward until arms extend
Return maintaining tension

exercises.name: Resistance band fly
instructions: Band behind at chest height; arms wide
Bring hands together, hugging motion
Return wide
avoid: Bending elbows more as hands meet

exercises.name: Abdominal vacuum
instructions: Exhale fully
Pull belly button toward spine
Hold 10-20 seconds, breathing shallowly
tips: Pull navel inward, not just sucking in

exercises.name: Barbell deadlift
exercises.description: Compound lift from floor to hip
instructions: Feet hip-width; bar over mid-foot
Hinge and grip just outside legs
Drive through heels to stand; reverse to lower

exercises.name: Barbell rollout
instructions: Kneel behind loaded bar; hands shoulder-width
Roll forward, extending body toward floor
Use core to pull back
tips: Only go as far as you can return

exercises.name: Bicycle crunch
instructions: Lie on back; hands behind head, legs lifted
Bring knee to chest while extending opposite leg
Rotate elbow toward bent knee; alternate sides

exercises.name: Bird dog
exercises.description: Core stability with opposite arm/leg extension
instructions: Hands and knees, neutral spine
Extend opposite arm and leg simultaneously
Hold briefly; alternate sides

exercises.name: Cable crunch
instructions: Kneel facing cable; rope at sides of head
Crunch by flexing spine, elbows toward thighs
Return with control
tips: Curl spine, don't hinge at hips
Arms fixed; abs do the work

exercises.name: Cable side bend
instructions: Stand sideways to low pulley; handle in far hand
Bend away from cable
Return to upright; complete side before switching

exercises.name: Cable woodchop
instructions: Cable high or low; stand sideways
Arms extended; rotate torso diagonally
Return with control

exercises.name: Crunch
instructions: Lie on back; knees bent, feet flat
Hands behind head or across chest
Curl shoulders off floor; lower with control

exercises.name: Dead bug
instructions: Lie on back; arms up, knees bent 90 degrees
Lower opposite arm and leg toward floor
Return; alternate sides
tips: Only go as far as back stays flat

exercises.name: Dumbbell Russian twist
instructions: Sit; lean back, hold dumbbell with both hands
Rotate side to side, touching floor each side
Core braced, chest up

exercises.name: Dumbbell side bend
instructions: Dumbbell in one hand at side
Bend sideways toward weight
Return by contracting opposite oblique

exercises.name: Hanging leg raise
exercises.description: Advanced core exercise hanging from bar
instructions: Hang with arms extended; legs straight
Raise legs to parallel or higher
Lower with control
tips: Curl pelvis up, not just legs

exercises.name: Lying leg raise
instructions: Lie on back; hands at sides or under lower back
Raise straight legs toward ceiling
Lower with control; stop before touching floor

exercises.name: Mountain climber
instructions: High plank; hands under shoulders
Drive knee to chest; quickly switch legs
Keep hips low and level
tips: Knees toward elbows for oblique focus

exercises.name: Plank
instructions: Forearms and toes; elbows under shoulders
Straight line from head to heels
Brace core, squeeze glutes, hold

exercises.name: Resistance band Pallof press
instructions: Band at chest height; hold at chest
Stand perpendicular to anchor
Press hands out; resist rotation; return

exercises.name: Resistance band woodchop
instructions: Anchor high or low; arms extended
Rotate torso diagonally
Return with control

exercises.name: Side plank
instructions: On side; elbow under shoulder, feet stacked
Lift hips, straight line head to feet
Hold; switch sides

exercises.name: Sit-up
exercises.description: A classic core exercise that brings the torso all the way up to the knees
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet secured or held down
Place hands behind your head or across your chest
Curl up through your spine until your torso is upright
Lower with control back to the floor
tips: Initiate the movement with your abs, not hip flexors
Keep your feet on the floor throughout

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.description: A prone exercise where arms and legs are raised simultaneously
instructions: Lie face down with arms extended overhead and legs straight
Simultaneously lift your arms, chest, and legs off the floor
Hold briefly at the top, squeezing your back and glutes
Lower with control and repeat
tips: Keep your neck in a neutral position
Squeeze your glutes at the top
avoid: Looking up and straining your neck

exercises.name: Barbell hip thrust
instructions: Upper back against bench; bar over hips with pad
Drive heels to lift hips until thighs parallel
Squeeze glutes at top; lower with control

exercises.name: Barbell stiff-leg deadlift
exercises.description: Hip hinge with minimal knee bend
instructions: Bar at thigh level; legs nearly straight
Push hips back; lower bar close to legs
Drive hips forward to stand

exercises.name: Barbell sumo deadlift
instructions: Wide stance, toes out; bar over mid-foot
Grip inside legs; drive through floor, knees out
Stand upright; lower with control
tips: Chest proud, squeeze glutes at lockout

exercises.name: Cable glute kickback
instructions: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
Kick leg back, keeping it straight
Squeeze glute at top; return with control

exercises.name: Cable hip adduction
instructions: Ankle cuff on low pulley; stand sideways
Pull leg across body past standing leg
Return with control; switch sides

exercises.name: Cable kickback
instructions: Ankle strap on low pulley; face machine
Kick leg straight back
Squeeze glute at top; return with control
tips: Limit range to what glute controls

exercises.name: Cable standing hip extension
instructions: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
Extend leg straight back
Return with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell hip thrust
instructions: Upper back against bench; dumbbell on hips
Drive heels to lift hips to straight line
Lower with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell sumo squat
exercises.description: Wide-stance squat for glutes and adductors
instructions: Wide stance, toes out 30-45 degrees; dumbbell hanging
Squat down, chest up, knees over toes
Drive through heels to stand

exercises.name: Fire hydrant
instructions: Tabletop position; knee bent 90 degrees
Lift one leg out to side, thigh parallel to floor
Lower with control

exercises.name: Glute bridge
instructions: Lie on back; knees bent, feet flat
Drive heels to lift hips
Squeeze glutes at top; lower with control
tips: Stop at straight line shoulder to knee

exercises.name: Hip abduction machine
instructions: Legs together; pads on outer thighs
Push legs apart; squeeze at widest point
Return with control

exercises.name: Resistance band clamshell
instructions: Side-lying; band above knees, feet together
Raise top knee, feet pressed together
Lower with control

exercises.name: Resistance band glute bridge
instructions: Band above knees; lie on back, feet flat
Press knees out while bridging up
Squeeze glutes; lower with control

exercises.name: Single-leg glute bridge
instructions: One knee bent, other leg extended
Drive heel to lift hips; keep level
Lower with control

exercises.name: Back hyperextension
instructions: Hips on pad; arms crossed
Lower torso by hinging at hips
Raise to straight line
tips: Squeeze glutes and hamstrings at top

exercises.name: Barbell good morning
exercises.description: Hip hinge with bar for hamstrings and lower back
instructions: Bar on upper back; feet hip-width
Hinge at hips until torso near parallel
Drive hips forward to return
tips: Push hips back, not torso forward

exercises.name: Barbell Romanian deadlift
exercises.description: Barbell hip hinge for posterior chain
instructions: Bar at hip level; overhand grip
Hinge at hips with slight knee bend
Lower along legs until stretch; drive hips to stand

exercises.name: Cable lying leg curl
instructions: Face down; ankles under pad
Curl heels toward glutes; squeeze at top
Lower with control

exercises.name: Cable standing leg curl
instructions: Ankle cuff on low pulley; face machine
Curl heel toward glute
Lower with control; switch legs
tips: Thigh in line with standing leg

exercises.name: Dumbbell Romanian deadlift
instructions: Dumbbells in front of thighs
Hinge at hips with slight knee bend
Lower along legs until stretch; drive hips to stand

exercises.name: Dumbbell single-leg Romanian deadlift
instructions: One leg; dumbbell in opposite hand
Hinge, extending free leg behind
Lower until torso near parallel; return
tips: Torso and back leg move as unit

exercises.name: Glute-ham raise
instructions: GHD with feet secured, knees on pad
Lower torso by extending knees
Curl back up by flexing knees

exercises.name: Lying leg curl
instructions: Face down; pad on lower calves
Curl heels toward glutes
Lower with control

exercises.name: Nordic curl
instructions: Kneel; ankles secured
Lower forward by extending knees
Pull back up with hamstrings
tips: Only lower as far as you can control

exercises.name: Resistance band good morning
instructions: Band under feet, looped behind neck
Hinge at hips, push butt back
Drive hips forward to stand

exercises.name: Resistance band leg curl
instructions: Band anchored low; around ankles, face down
Curl heels toward glutes
Lower with control

exercises.name: Seated leg curl
instructions: Pad on lower calves; legs extended
Curl heels under seat
Return with control

exercises.name: Barbell back squat
exercises.description: Compound lower body lift for strength and mass
instructions: Bar on upper back (high bar) or rear delts (low bar)
Unrack, feet shoulder-width; squat to parallel or below
Drive through feet to stand
tips: Push knees out in direction toes point
Keep bar path vertical over mid-foot
avoid: Knees caving inward out of the hole

exercises.name: Barbell front squat
instructions: Bar on front delts, elbows high
Squat down while staying upright
Drive through feet to stand
tips: Push knees forward to hit depth

exercises.name: Barbell lunge
instructions: Bar across upper back; step forward into lunge
Lower until rear knee nearly touches floor
Push through front foot to stand
avoid: Letting the front knee cave inward

exercises.name: Barbell split squat
instructions: Bar across upper back; split stance
Lower until rear knee nearly touches floor
Push through front foot to stand
avoid: Letting the front knee cave inward

exercises.name: Barbell step-up
exercises.description: Step-up with barbell for unilateral leg work
instructions: Bar across upper back; face box at knee height
Step up, driving through heel
Step down with control
tips: Don't push off with back foot
avoid: Using the back leg to push up

exercises.name: Bodyweight squat
instructions: Feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out
Squat to parallel or below
Drive through feet to stand
tips: Push knees out in direction toes point

exercises.name: Dumbbell goblet squat
exercises.description: Front-loaded squat for learning squat mechanics
instructions: Hold dumbbell vertically at chest, cupping top end
Squat down, keeping weight close to chest
Drive through feet to stand
tips: Let elbows track inside knees at bottom
Use weight as counterbalance to sit deeper

exercises.name: Dumbbell lunge
exercises.description: Unilateral leg exercise for strength and balance
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides; step forward into lunge
Lower until back knee nearly touches floor
Push through front foot to stand
tips: Step far enough for both knees to reach 90 degrees
Drive through heel, not ball of foot
avoid: Step too short (knee tracks too far forward)

exercises.name: Dumbbell step down
instructions: Stand on box holding dumbbells at sides
Lower one foot by bending standing leg
Touch heel lightly, then push back up

exercises.name: Dumbbell step-up
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides; face platform
Step up, driving through that foot
Step down with control
tips: Don't push off with trailing foot
avoid: Using back leg to push off

exercises.name: Jump squat
instructions: Squat to parallel, then explode upward
Fully extend hips, knees, and ankles
Land softly and immediately descend
tips: Absorb landing through ankles, knees, hips
Swing arms up for added power

exercises.name: Leg extension
instructions: Pad on lower shins; back against seat
Extend legs until straight
Lower with control
tips: Dorsiflex toes for more quad activation

exercises.name: Leg press
instructions: Feet shoulder-width on platform
Lower until 90 degrees at knee
Press back up without full lockout
tips: Keep lower back flat against pad
Feet high = glutes; feet low = quads

exercises.name: Pistol squat
exercises.description: Single-leg squat requiring strength and mobility
instructions: Stand on one leg, other extended forward
Lower until hamstring touches calf
Drive through standing foot to rise

exercises.name: Resistance band leg extension
instructions: Sit with band anchored behind; loop around ankle
Extend knee until leg is straight
Return with control
tips: Dorsiflex toe for more quad engagement

exercises.name: Resistance band squat
instructions: Stand on band, feet shoulder-width
Hold handles at shoulders; squat to parallel
Stand against band's resistance

exercises.name: Barbell front raise
instructions: Bar at thigh level; overhand grip
Raise in front to shoulder height
Lower with control

exercises.name: Barbell overhead press
instructions: Bar at collarbone; grip just outside shoulders
Press overhead; head moves back then forward
Lock out over mid-foot; lower to collarbone

exercises.name: Barbell rear delt row
instructions: Bent over; wide grip
Pull to upper chest, elbows flared
Lower with control

exercises.name: Barbell upright row
exercises.description: Upright pull for shoulders and traps
instructions: Bar at thighs; shoulder-width grip
Pull along body until upper arms parallel
Lower with control
tips: Lead with elbows, higher than wrists

exercises.name: Cable lateral raise
exercises.description: Cable lateral raise with constant tension
instructions: Low pulley; stand sideways, handle in far hand
Raise arm to parallel
Lower with control

exercises.name: Cable reverse fly
exercises.description: Cable reverse fly for rear delts
instructions: Between pulleys at shoulder height; cross-grip
Pull outward in arc with slight elbow bend
Squeeze rear delts; return with control

exercises.name: Cable Y raise
exercises.description: Cable Y raise for lateral delts
instructions: Low cables; cross-grip handles
Raise arms to Y shape
Lower with control

exercises.name: Dumbbell Arnold press
exercises.description: Shoulder press with rotation through the movement
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you
Press up while rotating palms to face forward at top
Reverse motion as you lower

exercises.name: Dumbbell front raise
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the front deltoids
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at thighs, palms facing back
Raise arms forward to shoulder height
Lower with control
tips: Keep a slight bend in elbows throughout
Stop at shoulder height; higher shifts work to traps
Keep torso still; avoid swaying backward
avoid: Leaning back to swing weight up
Letting dumbbells drift inward toward midline

exercises.name: Dumbbell lateral raise
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the side deltoids
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms facing in
Raise arms out to the sides until parallel to floor
Lower with control
tips: Lead with elbows, keeping them slightly higher than wrists
Tilt pinkies up as if pouring water from a pitcher
Use a weight that allows strict form for 10+ reps
avoid: Shrugging traps to lift heavier weight

exercises.name: Dumbbell rear delt fly
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the rear deltoids
instructions: Hinge forward until torso is near parallel to floor
Let dumbbells hang below chest with slight elbow bend
Raise arms out to sides, squeezing rear delts at top
Lower with control
tips: Keep torso angle constant; don't rise as you lift
Think about leading with elbows, not hands
Pause briefly at the top to feel rear delts contract
avoid: Rising up to make the lift easier
Pulling with traps instead of rear delts

exercises.name: Dumbbell shoulder press
exercises.description: A vertical pressing movement for shoulder development
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height, palms forward
Press overhead until arms fully extend
Lower to shoulder height
tips: Bring dumbbells slightly together at the top
Keep wrists stacked over elbows throughout
Sit with back supported to isolate shoulders more
avoid: Excessive lower back arch to cheat the weight up
Flaring elbows too far behind the torso

exercises.name: Dumbbell upright row
exercises.description: Targets lateral delts and upper traps
instructions: Hold dumbbells at thighs, palms facing body
Pull up along body, leading with elbows
Raise until elbows at shoulder height, then lower

exercises.name: Handstand push-up
exercises.description: An advanced vertical pressing movement in a handstand position
instructions: Kick up into a handstand against a wall, hands shoulder-width plus
Lower until head gently touches the floor
Press back up to full arm extension
tips: Point fingers slightly outward for wrist comfort
Keep ribs stacked over hips; avoid banana-back arch
Push head through at the top for full lockout
avoid: Losing contact with the wall and falling off balance
Arching excessively to make the rep easier

exercises.name: Incline pike push-up
exercises.description: Pike push-up with hands elevated to reduce load
instructions: Hands on elevated surface; raise hips into inverted V
Lower head toward surface by bending elbows
Press back up
tips: Higher surface = easier; progress to lower over time

exercises.name: Machine shoulder press
exercises.description: A guided overhead press using a machine for stability
instructions: Adjust seat so handles align with shoulders
Press handles overhead until arms fully extend
Lower to starting position
tips: Keep back pressed firmly against the pad
Press handles straight up, not forward
Focus on feeling deltoids work, not just pushing
avoid: Arching lower back away from pad

exercises.name: Pike push-up
exercises.description: Push-up variation with vertical pressing angle
instructions: From push-up position, raise hips into inverted V
Lower head toward floor between hands
Press back up
tips: Keep legs straight to maximize shoulder angle

exercises.name: Resistance band lateral raise
instructions: Stand on band; hold handles at sides
Raise arms out until parallel to floor
Lower with control
tips: Tilt pinkies higher than thumbs at top
avoid: Bending elbows more as arms rise

exercises.name: Resistance band shoulder press
instructions: Stand on band center; hold handles at shoulders
Press overhead until lockout
Lower to shoulder height
tips: Stack wrists over elbows at start
avoid: Leaning back to compensate for weak shoulders
Pressing the handles forward instead of overhead

exercises.name: Barbell skull crusher
exercises.description: A lying tricep extension using a barbell
instructions: Lie on bench; hold bar with narrow grip, arms extended
Lower bar toward forehead by bending elbows
Extend arms to return to start
tips: Lower to forehead or just behind head for full stretch
An EZ bar reduces wrist strain
avoid: Letting bar drift too far back, turning it into a pullover

exercises.name: Barbell triceps extension
instructions: Hold barbell overhead, arms extended
Lower bar behind head by bending elbows
Extend arms back overhead
tips: Upper arms stay close to head

exercises.name: Bench dip
exercises.description: A tricep dip variation using a bench for support
instructions: Place hands on bench edge behind you, fingers forward
Walk feet out and lower by bending elbows to 90 degrees
Push back up to full extension
tips: Keep back close to bench throughout
Extend legs straight for more difficulty; bend knees for less
Lock elbows fully at the top
avoid: Letting body drift too far from the bench

exercises.name: Cable overhead tricep extension
exercises.description: An overhead tricep extension using cables for constant tension
instructions: Set pulley low; face away and hold rope overhead
Start with elbows bent, hands behind head
Extend arms overhead, then return with control
tips: Keep upper arms vertical and stationary
Lean slightly forward for balance and stretch
Cable tension emphasizes the stretched position

exercises.name: Cable tricep pushdown
exercises.description: A tricep isolation exercise using a cable machine
instructions: Set pulley high; face machine and grip bar or rope
Pin elbows at sides and push down until arms fully extend
Return to 90 degrees with control
tips: Try different attachments: straight bar, V-bar, rope
avoid: Letting elbows drift forward or back
Leaning into the push to use body weight

exercises.name: Close-grip bench press
exercises.description: A bench press variation with narrow grip to emphasize triceps
instructions: Lie on bench; grip bar shoulder-width or slightly narrower
Lower bar to lower chest, keeping elbows close to sides
Press back up to full lockout
tips: Keep elbows tucked at about 30-45 degrees
Touch lower on chest than regular bench press
Don't go too narrow; shoulder-width is effective
avoid: Flaring elbows wide, which shifts work to chest
Grip so narrow it strains wrists

exercises.name: Close-grip push-up
exercises.description: A push-up variation with hands close together emphasizing triceps
instructions: Start in push-up position with hands close together or forming a diamond
Lower chest toward hands, keeping elbows close to sides
Push back up to full extension
tips: Keep elbows tracking back along your ribs
Maintain rigid body from head to heels
The closer your hands, the more tricep emphasis
avoid: Letting hips sag or pike up

exercises.name: Dumbbell overhead tricep extension
exercises.description: An overhead extension for targeting the long head of the triceps
instructions: Hold one dumbbell overhead with both hands
Lower weight behind head by bending elbows
Extend arms back to start
tips: Keep elbows pointing up and close to head
Upper arms stay stationary; only forearms move
Feel the stretch at the bottom before extending
avoid: Flaring elbows out to the sides
Arching lower back as weight gets heavy

exercises.name: Dumbbell skull crusher
exercises.description: A lying tricep extension targeting all three heads
instructions: Lie on bench; hold dumbbells with arms extended over chest
Lower weights toward forehead by bending only at elbows
Extend back to start
tips: Keep upper arms vertical and stationary
Lower to forehead or just past for full stretch
Control the descent to protect elbow joints
avoid: Letting upper arms drift back during the movement

exercises.name: Dumbbell tricep kickback
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the triceps with dumbbells
instructions: Hinge forward; hold dumbbell with elbow bent 90 degrees, upper arm parallel to floor
Extend arm back until straight
Return to 90 degrees
tips: Keep upper arm locked parallel to floor; only forearm moves
Squeeze tricep hard at full extension
Use lighter weight for strict form
avoid: Dropping the elbow as you extend

exercises.name: Resistance band overhead tricep extension
exercises.description: An overhead tricep extension using resistance bands
instructions: Stand on band; hold other end overhead with elbows bent
Extend arms straight up
Lower behind head with control
tips: Keep elbows pointing forward and close to head
Upper arms should stay stationary; only forearms move
Overhead position stretches the long head of triceps

exercises.name: Resistance band tricep pushdown
exercises.description: A tricep pushdown using resistance bands
instructions: Anchor band above head; grip with both hands, elbows at 90 degrees
Extend arms down until elbows lock out
Return to 90 degrees with control
tips: Pin elbows at your sides; only forearms move
Squeeze triceps hard at full extension
Don't let band snap back; control the return
avoid: Letting elbows drift forward during extension
Leaning excessively to help push down

exercises.name: Tricep dip
exercises.description: A compound pushing exercise targeting the triceps
instructions: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms locked out
Lower by bending elbows until upper arms are parallel to floor
Push back up to full arm extension
tips: Stay upright to emphasize triceps; lean forward for more chest
Keep elbows pointing back, not flared out
Lock out fully at the top of each rep
avoid: Descending too deep, stressing the shoulder capsule
Flaring elbows wide to the sides
